name: Standoff
desc:
You can cast this spell while rolling initiative to fill the air with intense tension. Creatures in range other than you must make an Intuition saving throw to move or take any action.

The spell ends if you or any creature within the spell's effect move or take an action, or a creature within the spell's effect is damaged.
empower: When a creature other than you ends the spell, you gain 2 AP and can immediately make a response.
author: CrusaderDroid
